description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows OLE remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-21435), it is imperative to apply the KB5035853 update to affected systems:

1. Access the Microsoft Update Catalog at the following link: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853.
2. Download the KB5035853 update package corresponding to your system’s build version.
3. Install the update by following the on-screen prompts.
4. Restart your system to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a critical vulnerability that allows for remote code execution, emphasizing the importance of applying it promptly.
- Ensure your system is running either Windows 11 Version 23H2 (10.0.22631.3296) or Version 22H2 (10.0.22621.3296) before proceeding with the installation.
- Backup any critical data prior to applying the update to mitigate any potential data loss during the update process.
